Host Environment Page (Target Properties Dialog Box)

Requires: Application Builder or Professional System

In the Project Explorer window, right-click a target and select Properties from the shortcut menu to display the target Properties dialog box. Select Host Environment from the Category list to display this page.

Use this page to enable polling the status of the front panel connection with targets and to set the polling options.

This page includes the following components:

  • Periodically check responsiveness of RT Protocol—Enables polling the status of the connection to the target.
    • Ping Delay—Specifies the amount of time, in milliseconds, that must elapse without receiving any communication from the target before the host computer sends a ping to check the responsiveness of the target.
    • Ping Timeout—Specifies the amount of time, in milliseconds, that the host can wait for the ping to return before displaying a dialog box that warns of an unreliable or dropped connection.
